Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class PluginHandler

    This class is responsible for loading and keeping informations about different Actions that implement ActionBase abstract class.

    List of actions can be acquired by calling GetActionTypes(). Before we can do that we must call LoadActions() to load action types information from plugin dll file. Folder that keeps plugin dlls is acquired by calling Helpers.GetDataFolder().

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    PluginHandler
    Namespace: CommonInterfaces
    Assembly: CommonInterfaces.dll
    Syntax
